Property.name: AccessCode
Property.Description: Access code for full filling by customer

Method.name: Create
Method.Implementation:
set approved = ..%New()
set dirty = ##class(Stc.Data.OrderDirty).%OpenId(dirtyId,3,.status)
//set approved.Partner = dirty.Partner set approved.TrainingDate = dirty.TrainingDate set approved.Course = dirty.Course //set approved.City = dirty.City set approved.Company = dirty.Company //set approved.Latitude = dirty.Latitude //set approved.Longitude = dirty.Longitude set approved.CreatedTS = dirty.CreatedTS
set approved.AccessCode = $SYSTEM.Util.CreateGUID() set approved.OrderStatus = ##class(OrderStatus).CodeIdxOpen("Approved")
set status = approved.%Save()
quit approved

Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.status = ..OrderStatus.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.code = ..AccessCode //set proxy.city = ..City.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.course = ..Course.ConvertToProxyObject(1) set proxy.contact = ..Company.Contact.ConvertToProxyObject() //set proxy.contact.partner = ..Partner set proxy.date = $ZDATE(..TrainingDate, 3) set proxy.createdTS = ..CreatedTS
set proxy.studentsNumber = ..Students.Count()
quit proxy
